axioms.name: Exploration IS Narrative
axioms.statement: The act of spatial discovery constitutes the primary narrative experience; story emerges from traversal rather than being imposed upon it.
derivations: Miyamoto's childhood cave exploration as design genesis
BotW's gravity design replacing marked paths with distributed attraction points
Jenkins' concept of spatial stories held together by broadly defined goals and conflicts

axioms.name: Discovery Over Telling
axioms.statement: The player must feel they discovered truth rather than being told it; revelation through exploration supersedes exposition through dialogue.
derivations: Original Zelda's deliberate absence of tutorials and hand-holding
Miyamoto's critique of introducing unnecessary rules in later titles
BotW's return to the original philosophy after Twilight Princess/Skyward Sword's linearity
Carson's cause and effect vignettes

axioms.name: Minimalism in Dialogue, Maximalism in World
axioms.statement: Verbal/textual narrative elements are sparse; environmental, architectural, and spatial narrative elements are dense.
derivations: Link's silence as player vessel
BotW's 900 Korok seeds vs. minimal cutscenes
120 Shrines as spatial puzzle-narratives
Ruins as cause and effect storytelling

axioms.name: Eternal Return with Variation
axioms.statement: Each incarnation of the triadic cycle (Link/Zelda/Ganon) recapitulates the essential pattern while introducing meaningful variation; the familiar made strange, the strange made familiar.
derivations: Skyward Sword's codification of Demise's curse
Hyrule Historia's timeline establishing reincarnation as canonical mechanism
Each game's same soul, different body instantiation
Tolkien-parallel: vistas of yet more legend and history

axioms.name: Silent Protagonist as Vessel
axioms.statement: Link functions as a semiotic vessel - a character with enough definition to exist in the world yet enough emptiness to contain the player's projected self.
derivations: Player imagines voice, creates identification
Archetypal and androgynous appearance for broad appeal
Personality defined by actions, not words
Courage shown through gameplay, not dialogue

axioms.name: Dungeon as Dramatic Act
axioms.statement: Dungeons function as self-contained dramatic arcs with spatial progression mapping to dramatic structure.
derivations: Spider Body model with central hub and radiating paths
Item acquisition as midpoint power gain
Boss chamber as climactic confrontation
Heart container as denouement reward

axioms.name: Triangle Rule for Pacing
axioms.statement: Three scales of triangular structures control narrative pacing through terrain design.
derivations: Large triangles create landmarks and visual markers
Medium triangles create view blockers to obscure then reveal
Small triangles create tempo changes in moment-to-moment engagement

axioms.name: Gravity-Based Player Flow
axioms.statement: Replace marked paths with attraction points to create organic player navigation.
derivations: Distribute gravity wells based on visibility and intrigue
Prevent linear paths through well redistribution
Ensure players orbit rather than beeline through multiple visible attractions

axioms.name: Glimpsed History (Tolkien Parallel)
axioms.statement: Create an impression of depth through partial revelation and unexplained artifacts that suggest vast unseen history.
derivations: Ancient ruins with unexplained artifacts
Old names referenced without explanation
Recurring motifs echoing across incarnations
Partial texts offering incomplete records
NPC legends telling variant stories

levels.description: Discovery pacing and meaningful choice structures

core_algorithms.name: EVOCATIVE_SPACE
core_algorithms.purpose: Generate spaces that evoke pre-existing narrative associations through mythic resonance and player memory
core_algorithms.pseudocode: mythic_resonance = identify_archetype(location.features); player_memory = query_series_history(location); emotional_charge = mythic_resonance * player_memory; return location.atmosphere = emotional_charge

core_algorithms.name: ENACTED_STORY
core_algorithms.purpose: Structure story around character's movement through space with position-to-narrative-phase mapping
core_algorithms.pseudocode: current_act = map_position_to_narrative_phase(player_position); obstacles = generate_contextual_challenges(current_act); progression = player.overcome(obstacles); return narrative_advancement(progression)

core_algorithms.name: EMBEDDED_NARRATIVE
core_algorithms.purpose: Communicate story beats through designed environments with historical traces and cause-effect vignettes
core_algorithms.pseudocode: for each zone: historical_traces = deposit_artifacts(zone.history); recent_events = stage_cause_effect_vignettes(zone.recent_history); discoverable_texts = place_readable_fragments(zone.lore); return narrative_layer(historical_traces, recent_events, discoverable_texts)

core_algorithms.name: EMERGENT_NARRATIVE
core_algorithms.purpose: Enable narratives arising from play through sandbox systems and player agency
core_algorithms.pseudocode: physics_interactions = enable_creative_solutions(); player_stories = accumulate_unique_experiences(); systemic_storytelling = physics * AI * weather * player_creativity; return player_authored_narrative(systemic_storytelling)

core_algorithms.name: TRIANGLE_RULE
core_algorithms.purpose: Apply three scales of triangular structures for spatial narrative pacing
core_algorithms.pseudocode: LARGE_TRIANGLES = create_landmarks(); MEDIUM_TRIANGLES = create_view_blockers(); SMALL_TRIANGLES = create_tempo_changes(); ensure visible_landmark_count >= 1; ensure obscured_region_count >= 2; ensure traversal_variety >= 3 options; return terrain.with_triangles(LARGE, MEDIUM, SMALL)
outputs: terrain with triangular structures at three scales

core_algorithms.name: GRAVITY_BASED_PLAYER_FLOW
core_algorithms.purpose: Replace marked paths with distributed attraction points for organic exploration
core_algorithms.pseudocode: for each poi: attraction = calculate_visibility(poi) * calculate_intrigue(poi); gravity_wells.append(GravityWell(poi, attraction)); while clustering_detected: redistribute_wells(); assert visible_wells >= 3; assert no_single_dominant_path; return dispersed_player_flow(gravity_wells)

core_algorithms.name: SILENT_PROTAGONIST
core_algorithms.purpose: Design player vessel that balances character definition with player projection capability
core_algorithms.pseudocode: protagonist.voice = SILENT; protagonist.appearance = ARCHETYPAL + ANDROGYNOUS; protagonist.name = PLAYER_DEFINED or 'Link'; protagonist.personality = REACTIVE + COURAGEOUS; return player_projection_capable(protagonist)

core_algorithms.name: DUNGEON_NARRATIVE
core_algorithms.purpose: Design dungeon as self-contained dramatic arc with spider body structure
core_algorithms.pseudocode: ENTRANCE = establish_theme_and_threat(); SPIDER_BODY = central_hub_with_radiating_paths(); SPIDER_LEGS = themed_challenge_sequences(); ITEM_ACQUISITION = midpoint_power_gain(); BOSS_KEY_SEQUENCE = final_preparation(); BOSS_CHAMBER = climactic_confrontation(); HEART_CONTAINER = denouement_reward(); return dramatic_arc(ENTRANCE -> SPIDER_BODY -> ITEM -> BOSS_KEY -> BOSS -> REWARD)

core_algorithms.name: ETERNAL_RETURN
core_algorithms.purpose: Instantiate new cycle of the triadic curse pattern for each game era
core_algorithms.pseudocode: HERO = reincarnate(spirit_of_courage, era.context); GODDESS = reincarnate(blood_of_hylia, era.context); DEMON = manifest(demise_hatred, era.context); CONFLICT = generate_era_specific_struggle(HERO, GODDESS, DEMON); return game_narrative(CONFLICT, era.unique_elements)

core_algorithms.name: DISCOVERY_PACING
core_algorithms.purpose: Regulate revelation frequency for optimal engagement across discovery types
core_algorithms.pseudocode: DISCOVERY_TYPES = {korok: HIGH/SMALL/LOW, shrine: MEDIUM/MEDIUM/MEDIUM, memory: LOW/HIGH_NARRATIVE/VARIED, divine_beast: VERY_LOW/HIGH/HIGH, master_sword: SINGULAR/HIGHEST/QUEST}; ensure minor_discovery every 2-5 minutes; ensure medium_discovery every 15-30 minutes; ensure major_discovery every 1-2 hours; ensure visible_next_goal >= 1 always; return sustained_engagement(discovery_rhythm)

core_algorithms.name: MEMORY_SYSTEM
core_algorithms.purpose: Implement embedded narrative accessible in any order with fragmented yet coherent design
core_algorithms.pseudocode: distribute_across_world(story_fragments); each fragment: is_self_contained = True, references_other_fragments = True, is_fully_comprehensible_alone = False; design for coherence at any discovery point; return fragmented_yet_coherent(story_fragments)

diagnostic_questions.question: Is the story primarily discovered through exploration or told through exposition?
Does the protagonist speak with a defined voice or remain silent as a player vessel?
Is the density of environmental narrative greater than verbal narrative?
diagnostic_questions.valid_if: Environmental narrative density far exceeds verbal narrative density

diagnostic_questions.question: Does the narrative follow a cyclical eternal return pattern or linear progression?
Are dungeons designed as self-contained dramatic arcs with spatial progression?
diagnostic_questions.valid_if: Yes, following spider body model with entrance, hub, legs, item, boss, reward

diagnostic_questions.question: Does the world design use gravity wells and triangle rule for player flow?
diagnostic_questions.valid_if: Yes, with multiple visible attractions and no single dominant path

diagnostic_questions.question: Is there an impression of vast unseen history through partial revelation?
diagnostic_questions.valid_if: Yes, through ruins, old names, recurring motifs, and partial texts

diagnostic_questions.question: Does gameplay priority come before story priority?
diagnostic_questions.valid_if: Yes, story is a vessel for gameplay understanding

diagnostic_questions.question: Can the player experience the narrative non-linearly with coherence at any discovery point?

maps_to: Henry Jenkins: Game Design as Narrative Architecture (2002)
Joseph Campbell: The Hero with a Thousand Faces (1949)
Tom Shippey on Tolkien's Impression of Depth

core_operations: Dungeon as dramatic arc (spider body model)
Impression of depth through partial revelation
key_constraints: Exploration must constitute the primary narrative experience
Player must feel they discovered truth rather than being told it
Environmental narrative density must exceed verbal narrative density
Each incarnation must recapitulate pattern while introducing variation
Protagonist must remain silent as player projection vessel
Visible landmark count must be at least 1 from any viewpoint
Visible attractions must be at least 3 from spawn points
No single dominant path through gravity wells
Story fragments must be self-contained yet reference other fragments
